description: Classic osso bucco is worth the wait for meltingly tender veal infused with so much flavour from bone marrow.
name: Classic Osso Bucco Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 veal shin, bone and marrow in
1 cup chicken stock, made with 1 stock cube

recipeInstructions.text: Dust each veal shin with flour. Heat the butter and oil in a large, deep pan until sizzling. Working in batches, seal the veal shins for 3 minutes on each side. Set aside on a plate.

Tip in the carrots and celery and cook for 5 minutes until softened. Pour in the wine and cook for 2 minutes until reduced. Add the veal back to the pan, pour over the chicken stock and passata, cover and bring to the boil.
Reduce the heat and simmer for 1.5 hours with the lid on, turning the veal halfway through, until the meat is very tender. Remove the lid and cook for 30 minutes more, until the sauce has reduced.
